sensorthings.components.observedproperties package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.observedproperties.engine module

class sensorthings.components.observedproperties.engine.ObservedPropertyBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Observed Properties.

This class defines the required methods for managing observed properties. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_observed_property(observed_property)

Create a new observed property.

Parameters:

observed_property (dict) – The observed property data to be created.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created observed property.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_observed_property(observed_property_id)

Delete an observed property.

Parameters:

observed_property_id (str) – The ID of the observed property to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_observed_properties(observed_property_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve observed properties based on provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • observed_property_ids (List[str], optional) – List of observed property IDs to filter the results.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination information to limit the number of results.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering information to sort the results.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filters to apply to the query.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded information in the results.

Return type:

(Dict[str, dict], int)

Returns:

  • Dict[str, dict] – A dictionary of observed properties, keyed by their IDs.

  • int – The total number of observed properties matching the query.

abstract update_observed_property(observed_property_id, observed_property)

Update an existing observed property.

Parameters:

  • observed_property_id (str) – The ID of the observed property to update.

  • observed_property (dict) – The updated observed property data.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.observedproperties.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.observedproperties.schemas.ObservedProperty(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, ObservedPropertyFields, ObservedPropertyRelations

A schema representing an observed property.

This class combines the fields and relations of an observed property, and extends the BaseComponent class.
